title: Coroner’s Office identifies gunshot victim
content:
The Aiken County Coroner’s Office has identified the Belvedere man who died Friday from a self-inflicted gunshot wound.
Marquist Fuller, 20, of Belvedere, was pronounced dead at 10:24 p.m. Friday at Medical Center of Augusta University, according to a news release provided by the Coroner’s Office. The incident occurred at approximately 1 p.m. on Friday at a residence in Clearwater.
Aiken County Sheriff’s Office deputies determined Fuller suffered from a self-inflicted gunshot wound to the head, according to Capt. Eric Abdullah.
The Coroner’s Office is in the process of gathering information in an effort to determine manner of death. An autopsy is scheduled for Monday morning in Newberry.
